title: Remember when Riot cared?
body:
Remember every-champion-is-free Saturdays? Those ended in season one (Two? I came back near the end of S2). Remember 80 ping? Mine has been going up ever since the end of season two. It's up to 130-150 constant. Remember when Riot would give an IP boost and some RP for server crashes? We would all have every single champion and skin by now if they still did that.

Tryndamere was an awesome guy. But I think he's pretty much like Bill Gates and Microsoft now. Bill Gates is just the name behind Microsoft, and doesn't do anything.

Ghostcrawler is who we have to blame for everything going down the shitbox, I believe.
